dcterms:creator: Miguel A. Hernán
James M. Robins
dcterms:description: A dataset used to emulate a clinical trial comparing the effects of vancomycin versus other antibiotics on patients diagnosed with acute bacterial skin and skin structure infections (ABSSSI) due to methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA).
dcterms:title: Treatment-randomized dataset (vancomycin vs. other antibiotic)

dcterms:creator: Daniel Ho
Kosuke Imai
Gary King
Elizabeth A. Stuart
dcterms:description: A dataset created through propensity score matching to balance the treatment and control groups in the study of ABSSSI-MRSA.
dcterms:title: Propensity score matched dataset

dcterms:creator: Pamela J. Levine
Miriam R. Elman
Ravina Kullar
John M. Townes
David T. Bearden
Rowena Vilches-Tran
Ian McClellan
Jessina C. McGregor
dcterms:description: Electronic health record data from the University of Florida Health’s Integrated Data Repository, used to identify patients with skin and soft tissue infections.
dcterms:title: Electronic health record data from University of Florida (UF) Health’s Integrated Data Repository (IDR)

dcterms:creator: John Weigelt
Kamal Itani
Dennis Stevens
William Lau
Matthew Dryden
Charles Knirsch
dcterms:description: A dataset comparing the efficacy of linezolid versus vancomycin in the treatment of complicated skin and soft tissue infections caused by MRSA.
dcterms:title: ABSSSI-MRSA dataset
